page.title: 02Home Life
page.content: half past eight Mum goes to pick up a little boy and brings him to school.But I stay at home and wait for my four friends to come at eight forty-five.Then we walk to Chudleigh Knighton Primary School.It isn't very far and it doesn't take long. We get to school at eight fifty and have ten minutes play.Somebody rings the bell at nine'o'clock and we all run indoors and then we wait in the class room for the teacher to come in.When the teacher comes in she tells us to get our maths books and rough books out and we do maths about length.We have to measure things in metres and centimetres.At ten thirty somebody rings the bell.We play things like "bulldog" or" stuck" in the mud.At ten forty -five someone rings the bell and we carry on with what we were doing before break.Then at eleven fifty five
